reviews.review:
这是个不错的游戏，身为恐怖游戏该有的气氛渲染该有的音效都有，也算是个很刺激的游戏。

可惜我玩不习惯，毕竟比起被生存机会渺茫的追杀，还是带有反杀机会的游戏毕竟适合我。

抛开上边的话，我不喜欢杀鸡而退款的原因有二：

1、匹配时间过长（或许是因为智障长城宽带的锅）

2、对新手极其不友好，没有技能和有技能的差距太大！

但是我不太明白，为什么在退款那么久后我依然能写评测_(:з」∠)_

I really like the concept of the game. It's great.
But I feel like this game was designed for computers that were built specifically for gaming, because playing it on a regular PC is impossible, and this is almost entirely to do with the framerate. Playing as the Killer drops the framerate to 20-30 FPS, and using their special abilities (barring The Trapper's Bear Traps) drops it to 1-2 FPS. Playing as the Survivor is even worse. the general framerate with the Survivor is about the same as the Killer, with one VERY noticable difference. The INSTANT the heartbeats and dramatic music play, regardless of whether or not the Killer is actually on screen, the game almost locks up and it becomes impossible to escape. The next few minutes of your life will be watching the game go by in an almost slideshow fashion. One picture, then the next about 30 seconds later, then the next 30 seconds later, and so on until you get hooked. I can only imagine what my teammates thought of me just standing there getting cut again. Get hooked as the Survivor, you can spam the spacebar all you want, chances are you'll be dead before they register. I want to enjoy this game, I really do, but I can't.


I promise, I'm not just here to complain about the framerate. The games problems extend even beyond that. The matchmaking system is stupid. For one, the first player in the lobby is automatically the Killer, and if they leave the lobby, it shuts down and boots everyone who joined. This means that if you join a lobby with a Killer Host who doesn't want to be a Killer, you can expect to be sent back to the menu without warning. I really hope that wasn't a purposeful design choice, because it's stupid. When it does this, the game doesn't even tell you that that's what happened. You just get sent back to the menu with NO explanation of what happened. A simple "The Killer has left the game" would suffice.

I've seen the gameplay, and it's great, if it can actually be displayed properly. The horror element is really well designed, and would be enjoyable if I could actually see it happen.

Unless you have a high-end computer built for gaming, I cannot recommend this game.

Arkadaşlar yorumlarınızı okuyup az daha oyunu almıyordum. Ancak ben 1 saat oynamama rağmen lobi de beklediğim en fazla 4 dakika ki bu uzun bi süre değil. ayrıca optimizasyona gelince h1z1 kotk da var bende ondan cok daha iyi ve oyun çok akıcı herhangi bi optimizasyon sorunu da görmedim. ve iyi ki sizi dinlemeyip almışım dıyorum . oyuna gelince oyunu gece oynaam fırsatım oldu ve kulaklıkla oynadım. Allahım o nasıl gerilimdir. oyunu resmen yaşıyorsunuz. oyunu çok beğendiğimi söylemeliyim. 9/10 yalnız fikrim değişirse tekrar yazarım ilk izlenimlerim  böyle.

Honestly I like the game myself. It has a few pros, but what is most important it has a dev team who actually care about their costumers. No matter how much the community makes them look careless, they are actually doing a pretty good job trying to balance the game. At least that is my opinion, I used to think that they just care about getting money from cosmetics and dlcs, but since I have tried a few other games during this year I have found out most of these other game's devs are pretty much dont give a sh*t about the bugs.

The reason why I not recommend the game to any newcomers is:
1. The community is toxic in an undescriable way. No matter what you do or how you do it most of the players will yell at you, and telling how bad you are, delete the game or even worse things. Ofcourse you can try to ignore the toxicity but its really hard to enjoy a game when everybody is telling you how bad you are, or keep taunting and teasing you during a game not in the good way.
2. Even tho I usually play the game alone I don't recommend anyone to buying it if you are planning to play it alone. Mostly because of the things I have already mentioned. But also because the game is not very optimal for beginners. When I have started playing, it used to be better because there were more players who were beginners as well but even back then I think I would give up the game if I wouldn't be so lucky to find myself a great team. Nowdays beginners usually have to play with others who already have at least a few hundred hours and you would probably strugle during your first hundred games. 
3.  The game is also not very rewarding, it has a scoring system based on a very outdated scenario when there were only a few killers and survivors. Since then a lot of new character has been released but the scoring system are kept the same. Making it an eternity to progress to any great levels. I have 2.5k hours in the game at this time but none of my characters are maxed out. And I have also spent a lot of time farming with friends when it used to be available.

This game is probably the best deal you can get...catch it on sale for $12 of countless entertainment.  The biggest downfall is the glitches it has when joining servers for games, which frequently search and search for minutes only to be knocked back out to the lobby.  Hopefully they continue to improve this issue.  But for the money and thrill of the game, it's worth it.

I personally love this game with all my heart, theres alot of things i can do, Farm up, play with friends, meet new people, complment people on how they play. But there are some negatives about this game, and some postives! 

Postives: This game has a great systems, some (Really) Funny glitchs, And alot of killer/survivors you can play as, and build up youre charaters to how you like, Or make then solo charaters where you dont need people (>~< I wanted that heal!) Or so co depened you end up dead. (Dwight <_<) The game requirres you to do many things just to Get to the end of the game. Survive from 1 out of many killers with three other people,  Doing five generators while the killer hunts and murders your team mates, Save youre teammates outsmart the killer or survivor, and plus? Have fun! (Feels like people are forgeting this is a game for fun...) There is way more i can say, but im to lazy to, so on to the negatives.

Negatives: There...is alot of things about this game that could easly cause its downfall, As much as i hate to say it. 1 would be the salty survivors/Killers. Both screaming ``Oh their too op, or their using hax!`` Personally i find it funny how people will rage about the crazy things in this game. Yes im more of a survivor main so i dont really know the killer's side truely (But i am slowly trying to make killer as my main >~<) But the salt i see coming from survivors at killers, is horrible. Yeah ill say, ``Oh you camped, but gg!`` Because even if the round was too fast, ill still Say gg, Because of what ive learned ``Newer killers`` Camp for somereason.  Killers complain about 360's (Which im sorry killers, ;w;, and survivors that i have messed up their 360's)  but what else are survivor's meant to do? Keep running forward where you can caught up and hit them? The game is balanced for the most part, The devs do adove alot of question about things in the game during their streams, and  that they dont really notice the glitches in their own game.  Btw it takes forever to get into matchs T^T

(Even tho alot of my friends say its gonna die, *Sigh*) Its a fun game if you find the right team, and in genral have fun.

Known far and wide as the most toxic gaming community to ever exist. If you are considering purchasing this game, I STRONGLY urge you to spend your money elsewhere, as this game and it's community are neither friendly towards newcomers nor forgiving of their mistakes. Tutorial is nonexistent, and the learning curve is incredibly steep. 
Bugs that existed in 2016 during Early Access still exist, as the devs have zero interest in fixing the product, they instead want to release a new DLC every 2-3 months to milk more money out of you, or just forgo updates entirely and put out more cosmetics that only be purchased with real world dollars, not game points.

this game only has players because there is no viable competition right now.
As of 2022 nearly every aspect of the game is genuinely awful with very few redeeming qualities.

I really wish I didn't have to say this but, I wouldn't recommend it.

When it firsst came out, I spent hours on my friend's account playing it. It was fun, unique, and exciting. I bought it for myself eventually.

About a week later, it started going to shit. Infinite loops still weren't fixed, players were OP and all new content became DLC. Now, the game is literally unplayable. It crashes when I open it and I can't seem to fix it. The devs don't listen. 

Don't waste your money.

Внимание! У меня более 1200 часов в игре. Не рекомендую!

Плюсы:

- Игра с друзьями.
- Развитие личного навыка игры - скила. 
- Игра как в команде выживших (на расслабоне, по фану), так и за маньяка убийцу (где нужно уметь быстро принимать решения и придерживаться стратегии).

Минусы:

- С друзьями не поиграть из-за багов, которых в игре не становиться меньше, а только больше с каждым обновлением.
- Скилуха не поможет, из-за игроков противников, которые не умеют играть в игру, в угоду отсутствия баланса, "унизят" они вас, вернее всего жестко, если вам не повезет.
- Баланса нет, игра сильно перевешивает в сторону выживших, при этом разработчики пытаются, что называется, измерить среднюю температуру по больнице. Фиксят и бафают одинаково, что для 20х рангов, что для 1х рангов. Выходит что для 20ых рангов добавляют какой то перк или возможность и 20ки как не умели играть, так и не умают и им это не помогает, а в руках 1х рангов это обновление чаще всего становиться еще большей имбой, когда и без того всё было более чем комфортно в игре.
- Нет единых правил игры, можно играть "грязно" и побеждать достаточно легко, как за одну так и за другую сторону (так делают 80% игроков, в основном, недавно купивших игру - от 100 часов). У старичков сообщества, "грязная игра" не приветствуется, так как она портит игру другим, новичкам естественно не объяснить это.
- Загнивающее комьюнити. Вы узнаете о половых связях ваших родственников после 80% матчей. Слова доброго вам тут не скажут, а быстрее всего расскажут какой вы нубас и как было изи, что бы вы не делали. Опять же есть исключения, но тенденция гнилого комьюнити прослеживается всё чётче. 
- Баны в игре выдают лично разрабы, и что бы игрок не делал разного запрещенного, вернее всего если игрок не злосный нарушитель, он будет продолжать делать разное запрещенное, пока ему не надоест и портить игру другим.
- Рофлеров в игре очень много - игроков которые пользуются багами или слабыми местами в балансе, чтобы вывести вас на неготивные эмоции и поржать над вами.

Мой личный рейтинг:  7 из 10

Идея классная но реализация ужасная, к покупке рекомендую, если у вас есть лишние 500 рублей и огромный запас нервных клеток.

Игру нельзя назвать релизом, это ранняя опен бетта, не больше. Я давал игре шанс, тешил себя надеждами, но нет. Разработчики кормят обещаниями и завозят только новые баги в игру. Играть невозможно и становиться хуже с каждым днем. И дело не только в багах, но и в дисбалансе, который они только усугубляют. Посмотрев стрим разработчиков по игре, я был просто повержен! Они совершенно не умеют играть в эту игру, и теперь я понимаю почему вектор развития игры уходит всё дальше от баланса и такой банальной истины. Разработчики пол года обещают мне что всё будет иначе, в итоге не сделали и половины из того что обещали (сухой факт, подсчитано), а новых багов и косяков добавили в игру десятки. Они выпускают новых игровых персонажей, берут за это деньги (за покупку DLC), а важные игровые аспекты и баги не исправляют. Деньги давай, а играй как хочешь - так по всей видимости, считают разработчики. Идея игры классная, реализация ужасная. Это как купить ВАЗ 2101 1972 года выпуска. Вроде машина, вроде едет, но как-то, что-то всё ломается. В одном месте чинишь, другое выходит из строя. В добавок ко всему прочему загнивающее комьюнити. Это самая малая часть того, почему я считаю, что не стоит тратить время на эту игру. Чтобы запилить полноценный обзор, не хватит просто места отведенного steam на отзыв. НАДЕЖДЫ НЕТ! (Я оптимист по жизни, но не в этом случаи) И это мой первый негативный обзор в стим. Накипело.

Updated since the game has changed alot!

... For the worse.

Devs are still as incompetent as 6 months ago. They still deny basic issues that have been in the game since beta. 

Hatch standoffs, survivors swimming in items, pallet looping are more popular than ever.

Essentially get this game on sale for 1$, because you will pay in frustration if you play killer. Everything is stacked in the survivors favor. There is very little you can do with the majority of the killers that isn't reliant on the survivors making constant and fatal mistakes. And the devs stance to all this is that its "fine".

On the topic of hatch standoffs. There is a mechanic that allows the killer to "grab" survivors if you attack while they jump into the hatch. The thing is, the devs are so bad at making their games that this will NEVER happen.Survivors will just stand on the hatch waiting for you to hit them. THEN they will jump into the hatch since there is nothing killers can do about it. Devs stance on this? Its aparently fine.

Do yourself a favor and move on. This is not a game that should or deserves to survive the year.

For fans to tickle nerves :0

güncellemeler ile düzeldi, hilecilere tırpan vurmuşlar. save hilesi yapanlar yaptıkları ile kaldı o da basiretsizlik. oyun kendini tekrarlıyor gibi ama ben hep aynı heyecanı alıyorum. kaçmak saklanmak eğlenceli. bağlantı problemleri oyundan bazen soğutuyor. laglar ya da lag hilesi olabilr bilemiyorum. genel anlamda oyuna yeni karakterler eklemeleri ile heyecanı tepede tutuyorlar. artık tavsiye ediyorum.


AĞUSTOS / 2019

oyun hala beni eğlendiren tek oyun. çizgisi sabit, karakter ekliyorlar. katil rolü güçlendirilmiş. artık surviverda 1. seviye olmak o kadar da kolay değil. puan almak zorlaşmış. farm engellemek için bir yöntem geliştirmişler dahice. kısaca HALA GÜZEL OYUN.

AĞUSTOS / 2021

oyun 5. yılında ve hala popüler oyun. heyecanı kaybetmemiş. oyunda gerzek bir nesil türedi. yok paletde camplıyorsun falan. lan maloğlu mal, ister paletde beklerim ister pencerede sanane. sana kul kölemiyim. sanane benim oyun tarzımdan. ister pro takılırım ister noob. 3 kişiyi kurtardığım oyun da olur 3 kişiyi sattığım oyun da olur. eğlenmeye çalışıyoruz. bu salak nesil youtuberlardan bir iki kelime öğrenip bir de değer yargısı oluşturuyorlar. beni yargılayabilecek bir youtuber anasının amından doğmadı.

The game is actully verry fun if u have some friends ! If u are alone no problem , it's fun anyways ! With some bugs fixed this game has a lot of motential ! So if u are interested to buy a new Game witch has Multiplayer , CO-OP and a game witch won't let you ever out of content or something to do ! Buy it ! You won't run out of content ! You can level up and colect perks non-stop ! So buy this game , learn to play it , became one of the best and have fun !
